songs.title: Body Rock
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
H-Money!

[Verse 1: Ally & Normani]
I'm dancing in the rain
'Cause there's a fire burning deep inside for you
I'm locked into your chain
'Cause I'm addicted to the way your body moves
Oh, my heart is racing
And my temperature is blazing through the roof
And I'm tired of this charade
'Cause I can't hide the way I'm fiending over you

[Pre-Chorus: Lauren]
I'm overwhelmed I might as well stay
Underneath the spell you put on me
And when you touch me
I can feel it in my veins like electricity

[Chorus: Camila + Dinah + Ally]
All day, I'm only thinking 'bout you
All day, you got me going, baby
Always, I love the way your body rocks
When we rock, you rock with me

[Post-Chorus: All]
Body rock, body rock, you rock with me
Say this is how a real love's supposed to be
Body rock, body rock, you rock with me
Say this is how a real love's supposed to be, body rock

[Verse 2 : Ally & Normani]
I'm dancing in the rain
'Cause there's a fire burning deep inside for you
I'm locked into your chain
'Cause I'm addicted to the way your body moves
Oh, my heart is racing
And my temperature is blazing through the roof
And I'm tired of this charade
'Cause I can't hide the way I'm fiending over you

[Pre-Chorus: Lauren]
I'm overwhelmed I might as well stay
Underneath the spell you put on me
And when you touch me
I can feel it in my veins like electricity

[Chorus: Camila + Dinah + Ally]
All day, I'm only thinking 'bout you
All day, you got me going, baby
Always, I love the way your body rocks
When we rock, you rock with me

[Post-Chorus: All]
Body rock, body rock, you rock with me
Say this is how a real love's supposed to be
Body rock, body rock, you rock with me
Say this is how a real love's supposed to be, body rock

[Bridge: Dinah]
And it makes no sense at all (At all)
How your love takes me off the wall
And it makes my body rock

[Chorus: Camila + Dinah + Ally & (Dinah) & with Dinah]
All day (All day), I'm only thinking 'bout you
All day (I'm only thinking 'bout you always) , you got me going, baby
Always (Always), I love the way your body rocks
When we rock, (Woah) you rock with me

[Post-Chorus: All & (Dinah) & with Dinah]
Body rock, body rock, you rock with me (oh-oh)
Say this is how a real love's supposed to be
Body rock, body rock, (hey, hey) you rock with me
Say this is how a real love's supposed to be, body rock

[Outro: Camila]
Put your hands up in the air, put your hands up in the air
(Body rock)
Put your hands up in the air, put your hands up in the air
(Body rock, Body rock)
Put your hands up in the air, put your hands up in the air
(Body rock)
Put your hands up in the air, put your hands up in the air
(Body rock, Body rock)
